name: Imagine Fashion Life
description:
This 3D game features high-quality, realistic graphics and allows
players with a love of fashion to truly unleash their creativity and
live their dream career.

Live the life of a fashionista!

-Fashion designer: Create original outfits & ultimately your own brand,
as well as organize fashion shows

-Top model: Pose for glamorous photo shoots and set the catwalks on fire
with your perfect runway walk

-Mall owner: Open and arrange stores, decorate the mall, promote the
trendiest cosmetics and fashion brands in stores, and manage your budget
to create a world-class mall! Even open new stores abroad!

Keep up with the latest trends:

-Choose from all the latest 2011 and 2012 fashions

-Get new missions depending on your profile and other player’s profiles
that you pass via StreetPass. For example, a top model player could be
asked to wear a fashion designer player’s brand for a fashion show

Be a social butterfly and stay connected with friends: manage your
contacts list with your PDA and keep in touch with them to be successful!

Download a new non-player character Jane Lorner, with 6 exciting
missions, a rock background and Folk Festival clothes! Players will also
get:

Winter clothes to enhance the wardrobe

Sets of items for your apartment

A new haircut and

New music for the catwalk mini-game!

In-game content available for purchase using stored account funds.
